text: Transmogrify, a portmanteau of transfigure and modify, may refer to: * Transmogrification, the act or process of being transformed into a different form * Transmogrifier, a device in the Calvin and Hobbes universe that transforms its user into any desired creature or item * Transmogrification Potion, a potion in the Neopets universe that changes the species of a pet
title: Transmogrify
